titleStmt.title: William Henry, by the grace of God, Prince of Orange, &c. whereas upon our calling together the forces, we have appointed such officers to command them, in whom we may repose entire trust and confidence ...
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Starkey, and A. and W. Churchil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given at St. James's this 19th day of January 1688/9.
Announcing a general amnesty for desertion.
